column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque!!! SOOOOO good in every way! We've only been here a couple times but each time we've been here it's been beyond amazing for our family. Owner has always come by to talk to us
column2: which I greatly appreciate! I always get the sliced brisket with 2 sides. I love their regular and vegan dipping sauce! Everything is good! Like meat falling off of the bone good! Like...you just had a rough day and need some good ole comfort food and Smoque's is what will hit the spot good!
